author: Tyler Durden
title: Artist's Impression Of Obama-Trump Transition
text:
It's purposeful with the chairman.... It's the only explanation.... 
Omen IV Stan522 Jan 11, 2017 6:46 PM 
Cultural Marxism and via illegals and refugees coupled with his mantra that real middle class jobs are not possible with 95 million people out of work- the policy of Murder by Neglect 
blame technology for the elimination of jobs when the computer motherboard could be anywhere on the planet including the USA in a computer controlled lathe / automated quality control / movement of the assembly line - he wanted to make production in the USA "expensive" with his regulations and presidential orders to destroy the white middle class economic opportunities and the the TPP to finish off white technical jobs via unlimited H1-b entry 
cultural marixm would allow extreme fragmentation in the population and therefore the only group in control would be the elites as identity politics was the only reason for voting. 
He was the biggest disaster to hit the USA since the civil war in 1860.
